summary: A Belfast, Northern Ireland housewife takes up the peace cause, which causes her family trouble with I.R.A. sympathizers.
cast: Julie Walters|Ciarán Hinds|Nuala O'Neill|James Loughran|Barry Loughran|Elizabeth Donaghy|Ciarán McMenamin|Jaz Pollock|Caolan Byrne|Aingeal Grehan|Oliver Ford Davies|Nicholas Woodeson|Des McAleer|B.J. title: Titanic Town
